ProjectTitle: Exploration and assessment of probiotic treatment of vaginal candidiasis.

3. Privacy and ethics: Please indicate which committee approved your study, if this was the UZL ethical committee please include the S number. Is the processing of personal data at KU Leuven registered via the GDPR questionnaire or a PRET application, please also include the reference number here. Is the use of samples for this project the same as approved in the Isala project or are you reusing the samples for another purpose for which you need a new ethics evaluation? See for more information: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index and www.kuleuven.be/english/research/associatienet/ethics/index
6. Preservation: Please note that data related to a clinical trail needs to be preserved for 25 years, this is also recommended for all other clinical research data.
